attributes.action: let us have a General Election!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the British public should be able to decide who is Prime minister of our country. Gordon Brown has made a mess of the economy and is making a laughing stock of our country! We deserve the right to decide!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
